synopsis.text: Earth-Mars repatriation ship, lost for three years, is stumbled upon by Christopher during his Mars exploration mission in 2124. Hoping to find survivors, he boards the vessel and encounters Cyane, a ghostly passenger who had been en route to Mars. Desperate for companionship, Cyane, now a solitary specter on Mars, attempts to keep Christopher by her side. This intriguing tale is one of four short films presented at Animenotane 2021.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
